Headline: IBM shareholder sues company  alleging it overvalued chip unit

Headline: IBM uncovers new  sophisticated bank transfer cyber scam

Headline: Austrian software firm raises $165 mln to take on HPE and IBM in testing
Article: FRANKFURT  Jan 23 A little-known Austrian software company is looking to snatch business from established players HP Enterprise (HPE) and IBM in the market for software testing tools  after raising $165 million from a U.S. private equity firm.

Headline: IBM to integrate MedyMatch technology to help spot brain bleeding
Article: TEL AVIV Israel's MedyMatch Technology said on Thursday IBM Watson Health would integrate MedyMatch's technology into its offerings to imaging experts in hospitals to help doctors identify intracranial bleeding from head trauma and stroke.

Headline: IBM's cloud provides little silver lining
Article: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - IBM's cloud provides little silver lining. Big Blue fell short of investor expectations and reported its 20th consecutive quarter of falling revenue. Boss Ginni Rometty keeps talking up artificial intelligence and remote servers and services. Competition  however  may prove too formidable.
